questions.question: You are a student with an A1 proficiency in English. Your class teacher will ask you a question. You should answer this question with the minimum of 30 words. What are your daily habits? What time do you get up; etc.?

answers.answer: I wake up at 7 a.m. After having breakfast, I study for two hours. Then I have lunch and rest for an hour. In the afternoon, I study for another two hours. After dinner, I watch TV or read a book, and then I go to bed at 10 p.m.
